Description: Glazed composition figure in the form of a hyaena with the body cut free of the base which is decorated with a representation of two crocodiles.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Gen Sir John Grenfell Maxwell
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.53
Acquisition name: Donated by: Egypt Exploration Society (Commitee of)
Acquisition notes: Maxwell was President of Egypt Exploration Society.
